category: Product > wall covering: tile and stone
description_html: Mio is a new hexagonal tile collection from Nemo Tile + Stone. With its geometric shape and multi-colored porcelain composition, Mio provides a contemporary twist on a classic style. A play on traditional parquet flooring, Mio features an asymmetrical striation that provides an angular and elegant look, making it the perfect solution for any residential or hospitality space. Dark and dramatic base tones of the ebony wood veneer are elevated with the nature-inspired patterns with white, tan and brown color options. The collection is suitable for both floor and wall applications.
